title: index
content:
Give your brain a workout and have fun!
One Stroke Calculation Brain Training Game
This game is a puzzle game where you calculate addition, subtraction and multiplication in one continuous stroke.
The controls are simple! Just connect the numbers displayed on the screen in one line.
The rules are simple so anyone can play easily, but as you level up the difficulty increases.
Work your brain hard and aim for a high score!
3 Difficulty Levels  【EASY】
Just simple addition and subtraction. Recommended for beginners. 【NORMAL】
Multiplication questions are added. 【HARD】
In addition to addition, subtraction and multiplication, the number of digits also increases.  Ranking There is also a ranking system to compete with top players around the world.
Update your records daily and aim to become the top player! Give your brain some exercise and improve your cognitive abilities!

title: Tip
content:
Thank you for considering the tip.
If you like the app and think that you would like to support the development of the app a little bit, we would be happy if you could tip us below.
 Amazon Gift Certificate Email Type  The destination email address for the email type is hyoromo@gmail.com .
Tipping is accepted from a minimum amount.
The money we receive will be used to fund development.
